price: Dan kepada kaum 'Ād (Kami utus) Hud, saudara mereka. Dia berkata, "Wahai kaumku! Sembahlah Allah! Tidak ada tuhan (sesembahan) bagimu selain Dia. Maka mengapa kamu tidak bertakwa?"
arabic: ۞ وَإِلَىٰ عَادٍ أَخَاهُمۡ هُودٗاۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥٓۚ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-ilā ʿādin akhāhum hūdan qāla yāqawmi uʿ'budū al-laha mā lakum min ilāhin ghayruhu afalā tattaqūna
